reviewText:
It's a great movie. The biological mother abandons her 3-year-old daughter Andrea and infant son Brad. Her husband remarries. He dies and his wife, Laura (Joanna Kerns) raises the two children on her own. After ten years of being gone the biological mother returns. Laura is afraid that she will lose her children.

This movie was originally called Whose Daughter Is She? It was a made for tv movie that aired in 1995.
